publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-4323 Michael Matheson: Fairtrade Falkirk—That the Parliament congratulates Falkirk on obtaining Fairtrade status; recognises the important role that Falkirk Council, civic organisations, the churches and local businesses have played in achieving this status; notes the growing support for fair trade products in Scotland and the benefits that this will bring to farmers and communities in developing countries, and encourages other towns across the country to consider becoming Fairtrade towns.
S2M-4323 Fairtrade Falkirk (lodged on 2 May 2006) Donald Gorrie*, Christine Grahame*, Alex Neil*, Rob Gibson*

S2M-4323 Fairtrade Falkirk (lodged on 2 May 2006) Rosie Kane*, Brian Adam*, Bruce Crawford*, Linda Fabiani*, Karen Gillon*, Robin Harper*, Fiona Hyslop*, Mr Adam Ingram*, Mr Mark Ruskell*, Eleanor Scott*, Stewart Stevenson*, Ms Maureen Watt*, Tommy Sheridan*, Patrick Harvie*

S2M-4323 Michael Matheson: Fairtrade Falkirk—That the Parliament congratulates Falkirk on obtaining Fairtrade status; recognises the important role that Falkirk Council, civic organisations, the churches and local businesses have played in achieving this status; notes the growing support for fair trade products in Scotland and the benefits that this will bring to farmers and communities in developing countries, and encourages other towns across the country to consider becoming Fairtrade towns. Supported by: Donald Gorrie, Christine Grahame, Alex Neil, Rob Gibson, Rosie Kane, Brian Adam, Bruce Crawford, Linda Fabiani, Karen Gillon, Robin Harper, Fiona Hyslop, Mr Adam Ingram, Mr Mark Ruskell, Eleanor Scott, Stewart Stevenson, Ms Maureen Watt, Tommy Sheridan, Patrick Harvie
S2M-4323 Fairtrade Falkirk (lodged on 2 May 2006) Dr Jean Turner*, Cathy Peattie*
S2M-4323 Fairtrade Falkirk (lodged on 2 May 2006) Frances Curran*
S2M-4323 Fairtrade Falkirk (lodged on 2 May 2006) Chris Ballance*
S2M-4323 Fairtrade Falkirk (lodged on 2 May 2006) Dennis Canavan*
S2M-4323 Fairtrade Falkirk (lodged on 2 May 2006) Mark Ballard* Contents An A B C D E F G H I J
